definitions.definition: To allow a sauce or flavoring mixture to absorb into something; to steep or soak something in a marinade to flavor or prepare it for cooking.
examples: You'll get a better flavour from the chicken if you marinate it first.
After the chicken has marinated for two hours, discard the remaining marinade.

definitions.definition: Of ideas or feelings, to mentally develop over time
Especially of a haircut , to settle in and for one to get used to it.
examples: It's not a bad haircut! You just got to let it marinate !

main_definition: ( ergative ) To allow a sauce or flavoring mixture to absorb into something; to steep or soak something in a marinade to flavor or prepare it for cooking.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) Of ideas or feelings, to mentally develop over time
( figurative , informal ) Especially of a haircut , to settle in and for one to get used to it.
